16266.quoteText: What Personal Data do we collect?
16266.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect

16267.quoteText:
Personal Data we collect from other sources

We also collect information about you from other sources including third parties from whom we purchase Personal Data and from publicly available information.
16267.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: Information is gathered about you through third parties

16268.quoteText: This information may include identifiers, commercial information, and internet activity information such as IP address (or proxy server information),
16268.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location

tosdr.case: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

16269.quoteText: identification numbers and features, location, browser type, plug-ins, integrations, Internet service provider, mobile carrier, the pages and files viewed, searches, referring website, app or ad, operating system, system configuration information, advertising and language preferences, date and time stamps associated with your usage, and frequency of visits to the websites.
16269.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

tosdr.case: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

16270.quoteText: • If you interact with our websites or emails, we automatically collect information about your device and your usage of our websites or emails (such as Internet Protocol (IP) addresses or other identifiers, which may qualify as Personal Data (please see the “What device and usage data we process” section, below) using cookies, web beacons, or similar technologies;
16270.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

tosdr.case: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

16271.quoteText: To opt-out of targeted advertising that is provided to us and to third parties by Salesforce DMP, click here.
16271.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

tosdr.case: You can opt out of targeted advertising

16272.quoteText: While some internet browsers offer a “do not track” or “DNT” option that lets you tell websites that you do not want to have your online activities tracked, these features are not yet uniform and there is no common standard adopted by industry groups, technology companies, or regulators. Therefore, we do not currently commit to responding to browsers’ DNT signals with respect to our websites.
16272.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

16273.quoteText: This information may include identifiers, commercial information, and internet activity information such as IP address (or proxy server), mobile device number, device and application identification numbers,
16273.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

16274.quoteText: <li>Third party providers of business contact information, including mailing addresses, job titles, email addresses, phone numbers, intent data (or user behavior data), IP addresses, social media profiles, LinkedIn URLs and custom profiles, for purposes of targeted advertising, delivering relevant email content, event promotion and profiling, determining eligibility and verifying contact information.
16274.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

16275.quoteText: Our websites may use social media features, such as the Facebook “like” button, the “Tweet” button and other sharing widgets (“Social Media Features”).
16275.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels

tosdr.case: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
